subtests.name: WebGL test #1: img domain (opengl.org:80) and page domain (web-platform.test:8000) are not the same.
WebGL test #2: texImage2D with cross-origin image should throw exception.
WebGL test #3: texSubImage2D with cross-origin image should throw exception.
WebGL test #4: readPixels should never throw exception -- not possible to dirty origin of WebGL canvas.
WebGL test #5: should not throw exception by toDataURL for WebGL canvas, which should stay origin clean.
WebGL test #6: should throw exception by toDataURL for NON origin clean canvas.
WebGL test #7: texImage2D with NON origin clean canvas should throw exception.
WebGL test #8: texSubImage2D with NON origin clean canvas should throw exception.
WebGL test #9: readPixels should never throw exception -- not possible to dirty origin of WebGL canvas.
WebGL test #10: should not throw exception by toDataURL for WebGL canvas, which should stay origin clean.
